column1: Do not be afraid; our fate cannot be taken from us; it is a gift.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
Fear doesn’t exist anywhere except in the mind.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more so that we may fear less.
The whole secret of existence is to have no fear.
A man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears.
I was never afraid of failure; for I would sooner fail than not be among the greatest.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
What you are afraid to do is a clear indication of the next thing you need to do.
In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out.
I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
Do that which you fear to do and the fear will die.
He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
I steer my bark with hope in the head, leaving fear astern. My hopes indeed sometimes fail, but not oftener than the forebodings of the gloomy.
The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You must do the thing which you think you cannot do.
It is weakness which breeds fear, and fear breeds distrust.
Keep your fears to yourself, but share your inspiration with others.
I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning how to sail my ship.
How very little can be done under the spirit of fear.
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage.
Run from what’s comfortable. Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious. I have tried prudent planning long enough. From now on I’ll be mad.
Be not afraid of anything. You will do marvelous work. The moment you fear, you are nobody. Be a hero. Always say, ‘I have no fear’.
When I hear music, I fear no danger. I am invulnerable. I see no foe. I am related to the earliest times, and to the latest.
All the power is within you; you can do anything and everything.
I do not fear death. I had been dead for billions and billions of years before I was born, and had not suffered the slightest inconvenience from it.
Fear grows in darkness; if you think there’s a bogeyman around, turn on the light.
You’re subject to sorrow, fear, jealousy, anger and inconsistency. That’s the real reason you should admit that you are not wise.
Fear makes us feel our humanity.
Where there is fear there is obviously no freedom, and without freedom there is no love at all.
It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
Collective fear stimulates herd instinct, and tends to produce ferocity toward those who are not regarded as members of the herd.
Fear is death, fear is sin, fear is hell, fear is unrighteousness, and fear is wrong life. All the negative thoughts and ideas that are in the world have proceeded from this evil spirit of fear.
Don’t move the way fear makes you move.
It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong.
Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today.
Be scared. You can’t help that. But don’t be afraid.
To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
I failed my way to success. Thomas A.
The greatest mistake you can make in life is to continually be afraid you will make one.
If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
Don’t be afraid to fail. Don’t waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It’s OK to fail. If you’re not failing, you’re not growing.
Most people, after one success, are so cringingly afraid of doing less well that they rub all the edge off their subsequent work.
Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we often might win, by fearing to attempt.

The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.
He who fears he shall suffer, already suffers what he fears.
He is terribly afraid of dying because he hasn’t yet lived.
Live your life that the fear of death can never enter your heart.
